# TextAlign enumeration

The different align types

```csharp
public enum TextAlign
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Left | `0` | Aligns the text to the left |
| Right | `1` | Aligns the text to the right |
| Center | `2` | Aligns the text to the center (only available when output type is set to Markdown) |
